title: Chapter 2233 - Chapter 2233: All Of You Can Come Together
body:
Chapter 2233 - Chapter 2233: All Of You Can Come Together

Chapter 2233: All of you can come together

Translator: 549690339

After a long while, bubbles raised her head and looked at Yuan Xin, LAN Yun, and Yan Xi.

“What are these guys trying to do? You’re asking for a beating!”

Pao Pao pouted as she looked at LAN Yun, Yan Xi and the rest unkindly.

it’s her! That space-time spirit mouse!

LAN Yun and Yan Xi had also recognized bubbles.

A young top ten war beast was too rare, and its talent was astonishing.

Bubbles ‘arrival had caused a stir back then. Many people knew that a space-time spirit mouse had come from the primordial realm.

Furthermore, the moment he arrived, he was taken in as a disciple by a terrifying God beast and was taught with great care. He improved at an amazing speed and his battle strength was even stronger.

During this period of time, many heaven’s favorites have lost to her.

LAN Yun and Yan Xi naturally knew about it as well.

At the same time, they were also rather afraid of the existence behind bubbles.

They did not expect Lu Ming to know bubbles and that they seemed to be on good terms.

“Hey, tell me. Are you and you the ones who want to go against brother Lu Ming? If you want to make a move, you’ll have to get past me first!”

Bubbles waved her little fists and glanced at LAN Yun and Yan Xi.

“This is none of your business!”

LAN Yun coldly spoke.

“Who says it’s not related!”

Pao Pao glared at LAN Yun.

“You’d better stay out of this. The LAN family might not be afraid of the person behind you!”

LAN Yun spoke again.

“Nonsense, if you want to fight, then fight, chirp chirp!”

Paoba was enraged and was about to attack.

“Bubble, I can handle these people myself!”

Lu Ming smiled and stopped bubbles.

“Oh, okay. Brother Lu Ming, beat them up for me, chirpy!”

Bubbles shouted. Then, she turned her gaze and saw dandan. Her big eyes immediately lit up, and with a move, she immediately appeared on dandan’s shoulder.

“Little turtle, long time no see, chirpy!”

Pao Pao blinked her large eyes as she sized up dandan.

Although dandan had transformed into a human and had even used a mysterious technique to conceal her aura, bubbles and dandan were both top ten war beasts and had extremely sharp senses. Bubbles recognized dandan with a single glance.

Dandan’s face turned even darker.

“You’re the little turtle! Your entire family are little turtles!”

Dandan said unhappily.

“You’re clearly the little turtle, aren’t you? Chirp chirp!”

Paopao pouted and said.

“Don’t compare me to an ordinary little turtle …” Dandan said angrily as she and bubbles stared at each other and bickered.

Lu Ming smiled and glanced at LAN Yun, Yan Xi, and Yuan Xin. He said indifferently,” “Since you all want to kill me, then come at me together. Don’t waste time!”

His words shocked everyone present.

“What? This cripple actually asked LAN Yun and the others to attack him together. Is he crazy?”

although his combat strength is not bad, he’s simply courting death by being so arrogant!

The others were shocked, and the faces of LAN Yun and the others became even gloomier.

Lu Ming wanted to fight the three of them alone. He was simply courting death. This was an insult to them.

“I alone am enough to deal with you!”

LAN Yun made the first move. He shot out a punch, and a lion’s roar reverberated through the firmament.

On his fist, there was a Lion jumping and roaring, its power shocking.

This was a mystical ability passed down in LAN Yun’s family, and it came from an ancient scripture.

Compared to three years ago, LAN Yun was undoubtedly more powerful. Not only did he have a breakthrough in cultivation, but his nomological laws were also more profound. He had already comprehended a third type of nomological law and had reached the stage of the first realm perfection.

With a punch, the lion’s roar shook the sky and the wind howled, crushing toward Lu Ming.

However, Lu Ming’s expression was calm. He simply struck out with his palm.

Lu Ming still only used the chaos law, the extremity law, the engulfing law, and the penetration law in this palm.

However, Lu Ming’s physical body trembled and an even stronger force erupted.

BOOM!

Lu Ming’s palm collided with LAN Yun’s fist, and a shocking tremor erupted.

Then, LAN Yun retreated rapidly. The lion on his fist let out a wail and exploded.

Bang! Bang! Bang!

LAN Yun retreated a few dozen steps, his eyes revealing shock and disbelief.

Lu Ming had actually forced him back with one palm. How was this possible?

Three years ago, Lu Ming’s abilities were only slightly stronger than his.

After three years, his combat strength had increased tremendously. Why was he forced to retreat by Lu Ming’s palm?

Didn’t lu Ming have a crippled body? he could not become an Emperor. Why did his strength progress so shockingly? He really could not figure it out.

The others couldn’t figure it out either, and they all opened their mouths wide.

Yuan Xin’s pupils also constricted, and her heart trembled.

I’ve said it before. The three of you should come at me together. Don’t waste my time!

Lu Ming said, his voice spreading far and wide.

LAN Yun, Yan Xi, and Yuan Xin’s faces turned ugly.

At this moment, he didn’t know whether to retreat or fight.

“If you guys aren’t going to do it, I’ll do it!”

Lu Ming was extremely powerful. He stepped into the air and attacked.

BOOM! BOOM! BOOM!

He struck out three palm strikes in a row. Three powerful palm prints whizzed out and headed toward Yuan Xin, LAN Yun, and Yan Xi respectively.

“Since you’re looking for death, I’ll fulfill your wish. Let’s attack together!”

Yan Xi shouted.

He made his move. A saber appeared in his hand and he slashed at Lu Ming.

Roar!

LAN Yun attacked as well. His fists were constantly blasting out, and there was a Lion jumping on both fists, constantly roaring. The power was extremely shocking.

At the same time, Yuan Xin made his move as well. He used all his strength and waved his fists. He condensed a mountain with all his strength and charged at Lu Ming.

Yuan Xin had undoubtedly become stronger. During the battle of the ten lands, he had only mastered a single law super power Technique. Now, he had mastered a higher level super power Technique. Every attack had the explosion of several laws, with chaos laws as the core, and its power was shocking.

The three of them joined forces, and the void was boiling. They were completely destroyed.

BOOM! BOOM! BOOM!

Their attacks collided with Lu Ming’s palm print. The void rumbled continuously and the force swept in all directions. Some of the weaker cultivators were forced to retreat.

However, what was shocking was that after the collision, Lu Ming’s body did not move at all. He stood in the void and his expression was very calm.

He was fighting one against three, and he didn’t feel like he was at a disadvantage at all.

“Impossible!”

Yuan Xin bellowed in her heart. The power of the world erupted in full force, and mountains crushed toward Lu Ming, trying to crush him into pieces.

At the same time, LAN Yun and Yan Xi roared as they charged toward Lu Ming.

“It’s nothing more than this!”

Lu Ming said. This time, he pointed three fingers in a row.

This was the chaos finger tribulation, but its power had far exceeded that of the chaos Ring.

Because of this finger, Lu Ming had fused five types of laws.

Chaos laws, devour laws, extremity laws, penetration laws, and array Dao laws!

In the Gu family, Lu Ming often sparred with dandan. Dandan’s understanding and application of the law had reached an unimaginable level. Lu Ming had also benefited a lot. His application of the law was far superior to Yuan Xin and the others.

The power of the convergence of five laws was astonishing.

Five huge fingers surrounded by five colors shot toward Yuan Xin and the other two..
